name: Dizzy's New Adventure Demo
description:
Graphics author: Luis Zuno

Game made with Dizzyga V2.5b engine.

Spoilers alert: video contain full demo walkthrough.

Controls: 
LEFT/RIGHT - walk, 
SPACE|UP - jump,
UP/DOWN - climb ladders,
CTRL+ARROWS - look around
ENTER - action
ESCAPE|Q - menu

F10 - Fullscreen (also you can enable it in VIDEO SETTINGS menu in game)
F9 - mute all sounds

Gamepad supported.

Music plays in this demo:

TEN SIX SENSE - THIRTH SENSE
MACHINAE SUPREMACY - STEVE'S QUEST
MACHINAE SUPREMACY - MEGASCORCHER
MASTER BOOT RECORD - +000HEX
RANDOM - SPONTANEOUS DEVOTION"
